description: The Fastest Way to Learn JavaScript, Guaranteed course teaches you to apply techniques used by world championship memory masters to the art and science of learning JavaScript. Rapidly learn and retain techniques to make web pages dynamic with JavaScript, from the unique angle of applying the techniques used by contestants at the World Memory Championships. This class will help you commit JavaScript to your long term memory, so you can write programs and build exciting, dynamic web pages. Build better technology, advance your career and earn more money by becoming a JavaScript master. With a 30 day money back guarantee if you're not 100% satisfied, there's no better time to get started than right now.
title: The Fastest Way to Learn JavaScript, Guaranteed
